definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)

sentences.english: He sometimes moonlights as a chef at Rover's, a French restaurant in Seattle.
sentences.chinese: 他有時去西雅圖一家法國餐廳“羅浮”兼職當主廚。

sentences.english: I started asking acquaintances if anyone was looking for a good sushi chef.
sentences.chinese: 我開始向熟人打聽是否有人需要一個優秀的壽司主廚。

sentences.english: Late in life he became chief cook at a restaurant in Corbin.
sentences.chinese: 晚年，他成了科爾賓一家餐館的主廚。

sentences.english: The chef mashed some potatoes to go alone with the steak.
sentences.chinese: 主廚做馬鈴薯泥來搭配牛排。

sentences.english: Well, my dream was to be a sushi chef.
sentences.chinese: 而我的夢想是成爲一名壽司主廚。

sentences.english: We surmised by the clothes she was wearing that she was a chef.
sentences.chinese: 我們由她的穿着推斷她是主廚。

sentences.english: Create an orange-flavored fuzzy punch with help from an executive sous chef in this free video.
sentences.chinese: 創建一個執行此免費視頻主廚與幫助桔味的模糊一拳。

sentences.english: Our chef is from the coast and loves seafood.
sentences.chinese: 我們的主廚是從海邊請來的，喜歡海鮮。

sentences.english: Four star chefs from Thailand are going to play the lead role in this festival.
sentences.chinese: 這家的泰國美食節是由專程請來的四位泰國主廚掌勺。

sentences.english: All chefs improve on Chinese food to suit local tastes.
sentences.chinese: 所有的主廚提升中國食物以適應當地的口味。

sentences.english: When did you first know you wanted to be a sushi chef?
sentences.chinese: 你什麼時候開始知道你想要成爲一名主廚？

sentences.english: Pomfret in Oil, the Chef's Recommendation for today.
sentences.chinese: 來一道油浸鯧魚如何？這是今天主廚的推薦菜。

sentences.english: Bankers put on aprons and become well-trained barbecue head cooks.
sentences.chinese: 銀行家系上圍裙，就成了訓練有素的燒烤主廚。

sentences.english: Which dishes does the chef recommend.
Today, I helped chef to pick some citruses. We also did some mushroom foraging on the way.
sentences.chinese: 今天去幫忙主廚摘柑橘，也順便去找了一些野蘑菇。

definition: to taste a small amount/to sample
